attributes.action: No benefits at all to illegal immigrants, arrested and instant deportation.
attributes.additional_details: This will help with rhe cost of taxes that us hard working people are paying by not housing and feeding these criminals and also take some pressure from the nhs
attributes.background: Protect our country with armed forces and stop illegal immigrants from entering with arrests and fingerprints taken, then deported to  the country of origin or a country of acceptance agreed by our political leaders. Make it clear to the world that illegal entry will not be given any second chances.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737105
